note: I'm currently SL in Game Audio and Technical Game Design at Staffordshire University and before that I was the course leader for MSc Audio Technology at the University of Wolverhampton for 10+ years. I'm interested in all sorts of things, from the live electronic music of David Tudor, modular synthesizers, and audiovisual performance, to accessible technology, experimental fiction, and AI/ML-assisted creation. Outside of all that, I enjoy landscapes, people and food, and travelling near and far.
